column5: For the tenth year in a row, some buddies and I will be pushing off to another wilderness canoeing adventure in the quiet Quetico. It is what keeps us going for the year until next time. This year we are taking a bona fide Texan with us (and of course plan to have some fun with him). The point is that we keep coming back because it is such a relief to us from ne Wisconsin. The place is a treasure - thank you, Canada, for the trip! We go because we need to iron out the wrinkles in our souls.
Where glad to have you Dane and all our american friends up for a visit every year. Enjoy your trip.Mike
